formal_name:
A Little Bit of... Magic
Made Fun™: Shuffle Games
description:
Impress your friends with mesmerising magic using A Little Bit of... Magic Made Fun – a collection of easy-to-perform tricks that you can carry wherever you go!

Shuffle Games turns your Nintendo DSi system into a magical, mind-reading assistant. Ask a friend to choose their birth month, favourite holiday destination or activity. Even when the results are shuffled you’ll still be able to choose the right one!

Also included is the bonus trick Vanishing Card. Picture one of the five random cards on the screen and the Nintendo DSi system will tell you which card you’re thinking of!

Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously-released software.

In game text is available in English and Spanish.
name:
A Little Bit of... Magic
Made Fun™: Shuffle Games
